question: Which country has directed the global technology giants Google and Facebook to pay the media outlets for news content?
explanation:
The Australian Government is set to ask the global technology giants Google and Facebook to pay the media outlets for news content they produce in Australia, as announced by the countryâ€™s Treasurer.
The competition regulator of the country, Australian Competition and Consumer Commission (ACCC) is expected to release the stipulation formally. This decision has been taken now as the advertising revenues have been collapsed due to the coronavirus pandemic.
